profile.profileDescription: This is an installation profile for Europeana Inside - Libraries. It will be joined together with the Museum and Archives profile

label.name_singular: Creative Commons CC0 1.0 Universal Public Domain Dedication (CC0)
label.name_plural: Creative Commons CC0 1.0 Universal Public Domain Dedication (CC0)

label.name_singular: Creative Commons - Attribution, Non-Commercial, No Derivatives (BY-NC-ND)
label.name_plural: Creative Commons - Attribution, Non-Commercial, No Derivatives (BY-NC-ND)

label.name: Data provider
label.description: Name of the institution supplying the metadata to the aggregator.

label.name: Provider
label.description: Name of the aggregator, supplying metadata to one or more discovery services

label.name: MARC 041 $a: Primary language metadata
label.description: Primary language of the metadata describing the collection item(s).dc:language

label.name: Digital object
label.description: edm:object and isShownBy: An unambiguous URL which allows retrieving a low resolution derivative of the digital representation from a Shared or Local Object Repository.

label.name: Sequence
label.description: isNextInSequence: An identifier for the digital representation that comes immediately after the current digital representation, as part of an ordered series

label.name: MARC 845 $a: Terms Governing Use and Reproduction
label.description: MARC 845 $a (=Holding): dc:rights of the web resource

label.name: MARC 856 $z: Public note: Electronic Location and Access
MARC 856 $q: Electronic format type: Electronic Location and Access
MARC 856 $s: File size: Electronic Location and Access
MARC 035: Local identifier
label.description: dc:identifier. unambigous reference to an entity in the local system of the content provider describing the collection item(s).

label.name: MARC 506 $a and $d: Rights of the resource
MARC 540$a: Terms governing use and reproduction
MARC 530 $a: Additional Physical Form Available Note
MARC 581 $a: Publications About Described Materials Note
MARC 530 $u: Additional Physical Form Available Note (URL)
MARC 776 $n $t: Additional Physical Form Available Note
Leader 06 and leader 07: Type of the resource
label.description: Will include minimum leader 06 and leader 07 (will become dc:type)

label.name: Leader06: Type of the resource
label.description: Will include minimum leader 06 (will become dc:type)

label.name: Leader07: Type of the resource
label.description: Will include minimum leader 06 en leader 07 (will become dc:type)

label.name: MARC 245 $c: Statement of responsibility
label.description: Contains entity information but also extra information.

label.name: MARC648 $a: Subject date (date the work is focused on)
MARC045 $b: Formatted 9999 B.C. through C.E. time period
MARC045 $c: Formatted pre-9999 B.C. time period
MARC 561 $a: Provenance: Ownership and Custodial History
label.description: MARC 561 $a. Contains entity information but also extra information.
